msbt.message: Someone challenged me to try talkin' about non-muscle things for once. So how about it, ?
I'm trying to build better workout routines for everyone, but to do that, I need to get to know them better!
Alrightwhat can we talk about<10_4 /> Oh! I know!
Your favorite kind of still ? That's really muscular stuff.
Yeah, it's great! I was actually talking to and mentioned you were into .But then I had a really bad memory cramp and couldn't remember if that was right, .
Your favorite kind of still ? That's muscular stuff!
Cool. I've been resting my memory muscle lately, but it turns out that makes you forget stuff, .Plus, I sorta said you were into when I was training with .
Remember when I asked you about and you said I'd like ? Still think so?
Whew! Glad you said that. I kinda told to try some yesterday.Except, uh I still haven't tried ,
So Still think I should give a try, ?
Whew! Glad you said that. I kinda told they should try .Except, uh I've actually never had
Didn't you say your dream job was being ? You still flexin' in that direction?
Wow! That's pretty cool.I was spotting for and our dream jobs came up. I might've mentioned yours.Mine's being star. Or maybe pro. I can't pick, .
Isn't your dream job? You still liftin' your way to that?
Wow! That's incredible.I was jogging with and our dream jobs came up. I might've mentioned yours.Mine's being star. Or maybe pro. I can't choose, .
You told me you were really into . Is that still your thing?
Cool! I ask 'cause and I talked hobbies during warm-ups, and it came up.Anyway, uh Don't be too shocked if thinks you're an expert on .
You said you were ultra into . That still your thing?
Cool! I ask 'cause and I talked hobbies during stretches, and it came up.So, uh Don't be too surprised if asks you stuff about .
OK, so my brain muscle's gone weak from overuse and I forgot Aren't you amazing at ?
I'm the best! I'm pretty good!
asked if I knew any experts during stretches yesterday.I said that you were, then suddenly worried I was thinking of someone else, .
Hey, my brain muscle's all flimsy from overuse Aren't you super pro at ?
I'm the best! I'm pretty good!
asked if I knew any pros during planks yesterday.I mentioned that you were, but then worried I was thinking of someone else, . Whew!
What's up, !Hey, so, my absurdly strong listening muscles overheard you the other day
Soyou like more than any other kinds of ? Is that right?
Whoa, hang on! That's awesome, ! I'm big into too!Hey, let me know if you ever wanna have a post-workout hangout with some . 'Cause I'm in!
Honestly, I don't know a lot about . Seems kinda cool, though.Next time we hang out, how about you show off some of your favorite , ? Sound fun?
Hey, so . Do you really like ?
Whoa, hang on! That's amazing, ! I'm super huge into too!Hey, let me know if you ever wanna have a post-workout hangout with some !
Honestly, I don't know a lot about . Seems kinda cool, though.Next time we hang out, how about you show off some of your favorite , ? Sound fun?
I caught that out of all , you like most of all. Is that really true?
Nice! Yeah, there's nothing like , is there?Hey, ever get a sudden, muscular craving for ? 'Cause I just did, .
I've never had beforebut you're getting me pumped to try it, !
Is really one of your favorite ?
Yes! There's just no way to beat , right?
Believe it or not, I've never had
So, is your dream still to be a way ripped ?
Very cool! If there's anything I can do to help you be the most shredded ever, let me know.
I honestly don't know anything about being , but I bet it's fun, !
Yo! Is your dream still to be a way ripped ?
Awesome! Let me know if I can help. I want you to be the most shredded ever!
Yeah, I don't think I have enough brainular swoleness to do that. Wow!
I caught that you're super into . Is that true?
It's the best! Yes, it is!
Now THAT is a mighty hobby. If my workout schedule allowed for it, I'd be all about !
I really don't know anything about , except that you can't do it while working out.Hey, next time we hang out, why don't you introduce me to , ?
Hey, I heard you're super into . Is that true, ?
It's the best! Yes, I am!
Yeah, if I'm taking the day off working out, sometimes I'll spend it on .Of course, I'm always working out, so that, uhnever happens.
I honestly don't know the first thing about Hey, next time we hang out, how about you give me an intro to ?
So is it true you're ultra-good at , ?
Being good at is super cool. Way to build those talent-muscles!
Mighty! I wouldn't even know where to start with .Next time we hang out, you should show off a little. If you're good at , I wanna see!
Hey, is it true you're ultra-good at ?
! What a cool talent. Way to bulk up your skill, !
Wow! I wouldn't know where to start with .Show off some next time we hang out. I wanna see how good you are at !
Is it true? You really don't listen to music? Not even when you're working out, ?
Are you really not into books? Hey, I get it. Most of 'em aren't very heavy. But is it true, ?
Do you really not read comic books? Butbut superhero abs are so inspiring, !
They're not my thing. I don't read 'em.
No, I read them! Huh? I read comics!
Do you really not watch movies? Not even the big, muscular, explosion-y ones. Seriously, ?
Is it true that you don't watch TV shows at all? Not even workout shows, ?
Do you REALLY not like any sports? There's no way that's rightright?
Yeah, that's right! They're not my thing.
Do you really not have a favorite drink? Or even a favorite protein shake flavor, ?
Do you really not have a favorite food? Not even a freshly blended protein shake, ?
I caught that you haven't picked out a dream job yet. Hey, no pressure or judgment, but is it true?
Do you really not have a favorite hobby or anything like that?
So, I caught that you don't have a special skill or talent, . Is that actually the case?
It's alright, I get it. There's a lot out there, and everyone's different.
Oh! Seriously? Guess I should get back on my ear-muscle regimen
Alright, alright. That's on me. I'm super-duper listening now. What was it again, ?
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really do like , then.
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really do like , then.
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really do like , then.
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really do like , then.
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really do wanna be , then.
Wait, isn't that what you said before? Oh! So really is your dream job!
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really are into , then.
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really are into , then.
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really are super good at , then.
Hang on, isn't that what you said before? Ah! So you really are good at , then.
Got it. Cool. I just wanted to be sure. Thanks, !
Hey! You like music, right? What's your favorite kind, ?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uhwhat kind of music are you into now?
So, uhwhat kind of music are you into now, ?
Hip-hop? Awesome choice! I love a good beat. Really helps me keep my push-up rhythm, .
Rock? Very cool! Nothing beats a sunrise jog to a squealing guitar solo, .
Hey, I listen to samba all the time! It's awesome for cardio. Plus, those dance moves are great for your core.
Huh. I actually haven't heard a lot of Hey, as long as you can work out to it, it's cool by me, !
Really? Hey, if you can keep your own workout rhythm, then more power to you, !
Hey, you ever read, like, books and stuff? What kinds, ?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uhwhat kind of stuff are you reading now?
So, uhwhat kind of stuff are you reading these days, ?
Oh yeah! I love field guides. They have lots of pictures and stuff so they're real easy to understand!
Self-help books?! But look at you! You've got biceps of steel, lats of granite, abs of diamondYou're perfect! What can a book do to improve on perfect, ?
Recipe books are boring. The story's always "a cup of this" or "a pinch of that." Where are the kung-fu battles?
Hmm I don't think I've ever read before.But I'm not the mostbooktacular , so that's not saying much, .
What? You don't read books? At all?<10_4 /> Ha! Me too, !I mean, I like books. I'll stick a bunch in a box and do deadlifts all day! But reading 'em? Not my thing.
Hey, do you read comics? Got any you'd recommend, ?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uhwhat kind of comics are you reading now?
So, uhwhat kind of comics are you reading now, ?
Oh yeah! Sports comics are super inspiring. I learn a lot from all the techniques they use. Like one where a guy pole vaulted a skyscraper. I didn't even know that was possible, but there it was!
Nice! Yeah, just about everything I know about muscle poses, I learned from action comics.Gotta be careful, though. Those're all hyper-advanced poses. Once, I posed so hard I sprained all my muscles
Horror comics are great! I read 'em before bed so the nightmares'll keep my heart rate up. It's sleep-cardio!
Huh. I don't think I've ever read before.Hey, as long as every issue's got a world-ending mega-battle between two way-ripped super-beings, I'm in.
Huh? You don't read comics? Then where'd all your awesome flex poses come from, ?Wait, are those all originals? Whoa! You're like some kind offlexpert!
Hey, do you like movies? What's your favorite genre, ?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uhwhat kind of movies do you like now?
So, uhwhat kind of movies do you like now, ?
Action movies get me super pumped. Plus, they show me all kinds of new moves I haven't thought of yet! Some day I wanna figure out how to do a slow-mo, mid-air flex as I dodge a huge explosion, .

Science fiction movies? They're alright, I guessBut why don't any of them show zero-gravity strength training? Or say how heavy space ships are?Or what time travel does for resistance training? Or the jog routes between planets?Or alien workout routines? How am I supposed to know if an alien is buff or not? Those details matter!
I like to put horror movies on while I'm doing cardio. The jump scares help me keep my heart rate up!
Oh! I don't think I've ever seen before.Is there usually a lot of working out in those? 'Cause I could get into that!
You don't? It's cool. I get it. There's only so many good workout hours in a day, right?
Hey, what kind of TV shows do you like, ?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uhwhat kind of TV shows do you like now?
So, uhwhat kind of TV shows do you like now, ?
Sports! Yes! This may come as a shock, but those're my favorite too.I don't care if it's , or , or . If it's a sport, I'm watching!
Variety shows are like watching a bunch of shows all at once.One second you're laughing, the next you're watching someone balance on a beach ball. They're really cool!
Music shows are awesome.I just leave 'em on all the time as a background beat. Never know when a push-up urge will strike!
Oh, really? I didn't think we got any shows out here.
Really? Hey, that's cool. No TV just means more time for cardio, right?
Hey, what's your favorite sport, ? To play or to watch, I mean.
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uh what's your favorite sport now?
So, uh What's your favorite sport now, ?
Yes! Soccer is the ULTIMATE team sport. Watching everyone coordinate like that is so cool, .And then the ball hits the net and the announcer screams GOOOAAAAL! I get pumped just thinking about it.
Oh yeah, I love track and field. I've actually been working on a new kind of foot race, !Picture thisthe hurdle-marathon. That's right! Twenty-six straight miles of hurdles. It's gonna be epic!
Basketball! Yes! There is nothing more awesome than a fastbreak slam dunk, !Oh. Except maybe a full-court slam dunk that shatters the backboard. That'd definitely be more awesome!
Whoa! I didn't know you were into !Then again, look at those magnificent muscles. You're probably a top-tier pro!
What?! You're not into ANY sports? Not even ? Come on! Who doesn't like ?
Hey! I think I wanna change up my post-workout beverage. What's your favorite drink?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uh what's your favorite drink now?
So, uh What's your favorite drink now, ?
Solid choice. I don't know what it is, but sports drinks always taste amazing after a hard workout.Plus, it's got "sports" right there in the name! There's no way you beat that, !
Soda's good, butafter a workout, I kinda want something I can chug.When I drink soda too fast, I end up burping up through my nose. It really, REALLY hurts, !
Milk's a great choice! It helps your bones, it's high in protein I even use it in protein shakes. Cool!
Huh. I don't think I've ever had before.Well, if you like it, then it's gotta be good. I'll give it a go after my next workout, !
Yeah, I get that. There's so much good stuff out there, it's hard to choose, !
My diet's biannual cheat day is real soon, but I sprained myideathing. Umm, what's your favorite food?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uh What's your favorite food now?
So, uh What's your favorite food now, ?
Fried rice! Yes! You can put just about anything in that! It's almost like a protein shake that way.I actually tried to make a fried-rice protein shake once. It was not good, .
Sandwiches are delicious. Plus, they're super easy to make after a hard workout, .Just stick stuff between some bread, toss it all into a blender, add protein powder Boom! Protein shake!

Yes! My diet's biannual cheat day wouldn't be complete without a big bowl of ice cream. Solid play call!Philosophical question. If I eat too much and get a tummy ache, that's technically a core workout, right?
Huh Come to think of it, I've never had .Wait, hang on, correction. I've put it in a protein shake, but I've never eaten it on its own, .
I know what you mean. There's WAY too much tasty stuff out thereThankfully, almost all that tasty stuff is still tasty if you blend it into a protein shake, .
I've got a feeling your ambition's as big as your triceps. Tell me—what's your dream, ?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uh what's your dream now?
Sports athlete! That's my dream too! Oh! But which sport?Like, should I be pro? pro? Or maybe pro?I can't pick!
Yes! Being a carpenter sounds like it'd be a ton of fun.Pulling myself up to high spots, hauling logs all day, sawing wood to work my arms? That'd be so cool!
You wanna be a hero too? That's awesome, !Alright, so every hero's gotta have a signature muscle pose. Next time we hang out, let's compare ours!
's your dream job? Whoa!That is super cool. I bet you need beastly brain muscles for that!
It's cool. No shame in that. Just keep an open mind and you'll come up with something that's right for you.
Hey, what's your hobby these days?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uh what's your hobby now?
So, uh What's your hobby now?
Strength training? Ha! I totally knew it. Muscles call to muscles, eh?
Oh yeah, camping's super fun!Being in nature, tearing trees apart with your bare hands for firewood, lifting huge boulders Good times!
That's awesome! I've tried doing a few DIY projects. I know how hard that is, .Hey, when I kick off my row-bike- treadmill-hang-glider dream project, could you help me test it?
Whoa! Very cool! How'd you get into ?I've actually always wanted to try that, but I have no idea where to start, .
Oh! Really? Is that 'cause you can't find anything you like, or 'cause you like everything and can't pick one?
Hey, what's your special talent? Like, are you super skilled at push-ups, or squats, or distance running, or what?
Oh! I didn't know that. So, uh What's your super-skill these days?
So, uh What's your super-skill these days, ?
Well, yeah! Your abs are way, ultra shredded! But I've got you beat.Just this morning I did sit-ups, then I planked for two hours straight. My core is on FIRE! Ow, ow, ow, ow!
Swimming's great. It hits just about every muscle group. It's also how I go visit buds on other islands!
Oh that's a good one! I forget stuff all the time. Maybe you could teach me a thing or two to help with that.Anyway, what was your special skill again, ?
I'm not sure I've ever known anyone good at .What kind of workouts did you do to get good at that, ?
Hey, it's cool. Just keep trying stuff and I'm sure you'll hit on something.
